name: Pumanin
description:
The grandfather who proudly bears the surname Pumanin decided to compete with other grandfathers in the pumpkin competition. But he did not even suspect what lay ahead of him. Dangerous enemies crawled out from the very depths of autumn to prevent grandfather from participating in the competition. Why would they do that? Unknown! But one thing we know for sure, there are 10 days left before the start of the competition. The grandfather and the pumpkin must go through these last days.

Developers: rzakolo, g3nv3.
